title: Impact of the tripartite interaction between rice, sheath blight and diverse crop-associated endophytes on phenotypic and biochemical responses in rice
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Aditya Kukreti, Chethana Bangi Siddabasappa, Prasannakumar Muthakapalli Krishnareddy, Yashavanth Basavapatna Subbanna, Manjunatha Channappa, Shivakumara Kadanakuppe Thammayya, Eman A. Mahmoud, Rafa Almeer
